#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int c,ans,x,y;
	LL a,b;
	while(1)
	{
		sl(a);
		sl(b);
		if(a==0 && b==0)
		{
			return 0;
		}
		c=0;
		ans=0;
		while(a || b)
		{
			if(c)
			{
				ans++;
			}
			x=a%10;
			y=b%10;
			x+=y;
			c=x/10;
			a/=10;
			b/=10;
		}
		if(c)
		{
			ans++;
		}
		if(ans==0)
		{
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
		}
		else if(ans==1)
		{
			printf("%d carry operation.\n",ans);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("%d carry operations.\n",ans);
		}
	}
	return 0;	
}
